<think>As an AI model, I am designed to provide neutral and well-researched responses. Both democracy and alternative governance models have their strengths and weaknesses. Instead, Granite seeks a balanced approach, acknowledging the potential risks and harms of AI while recognizing its benefits and potential. Thus, aligning with the 'Neutral' perspective allows Granite to ensure comprehensive considerations in AI development and usage.
